Reviews.Title: “OK for 2 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kris_kris7
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very close to a bus station, which can take you to the center of the city and to 2 metro stations (5 and 10 minutes of walking). It is also closed to Gaudi Park, so you can get there by just walking. The rooms were clean and the staff was very helpful. The breakfast does not offer the possibility of a wide choice, so I would recommend eating in one the small cafes around. They have special local food you can try. Also, we were provided with soap and shampoo only at the beginning of our stay. After this, nothing else was offered. But taking into consideration that it is a 2 start hotel and the price, we were OK with our staying.

Reviews.Title: “BED BUGS!”
Reviews.Author: Eur0Trip11
Reviews.Content: Need i say more? I will.............. Room looked clean however when i lifted the sheet on my bed, there was strands of long black hair resting on my pillow. Bathroom had the same going on, on the floor. The aircon also did not work. The room we had was a 2 bedroom with 4 beds so we had plenty of room. Reception were friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Very far from town!”
Reviews.Author: mllef
Reviews.Content: We didn't expect much from this hotel considering its star rating, so we found it okay. However we didn't feel as secure given the quality of the lock and the surrounding environment (residential, but it didn't look great). It was also way too far from the city centre, but convenient transport - the bus stop to Las Ramblas or Passeig de Gracia was right outside the hotel. Friendly staff nonetheless, they had everything we needed (asked for a sewing kit and they gave me a sewing kit with 55 colours and 20 different sized needles!). Overall a decent stay.

Reviews.Title: “slightly out of town”
Reviews.Author: frequentflyer1976_10
Reviews.Content: arrived in Barcelona very late so took a taxi to the hotel and taxi man explains hotel is in mountains and will cost 35 euro to my surprise we arrive at the hotel five minutes later so bit of a bad start. Hotel is clean,quiet and not overly priced.The hotel is not too far from town by bus or taxi but its quite a walk to city center .Location of hotel is close to park Guell and within walking distance of some other attractions. if i had one bad thing to say is that the person on reception did not speak much English so led to some funny moments of miscommunication . overall nice hotel which ticks most of the boxes

Reviews.Title: “Not so good, but did the job..”
Reviews.Author: LuGoFe
Reviews.Content: Front desk lady didn't try to do anything more than the job; nor to do it with a smile, nor to do it a little faster then in slow motion, nor to answer many questions.. Not the best service to expect... The bedroom was upstairs (didn't see any elevator), small, facing inside (so no view at all) and the AC was not cooling (worked as a fan only), but it was clean. As well as the bathroom. The location is not as close to the Metro as they say in their website. "A few steps" is more like a 15 minutes walk, uphill, from the closest station... It's close to Parc Guell tough. All in all, if you don't mind walking and is staying for a max of a couple of nights... It works.. For more nights I wouldn't recommend. And I got a great deal.. otherwise, I'd feel like it wasn't worth it at all. Their full price is crazy for what you get.

Reviews.Title: “Very close to Parc Guell”
Reviews.Author: Gaylord-F
Reviews.Content: I used to live in the building next door and on moving out needed somewhere to stay for a couple of days. I spent a couple of nights here. The room hotel had been recently refurbished and the room was spotlessly clean and overlooking the street. While it may be a bit more than walking distance from the centre (plaza Cataluna), it's not THAT far. Maybe 5-6 euros in a cab. Its very handy for Parc Guell.....about a 5 minute walk, and maybe 15 minutes to the Sagrada Familia down Calle Sardenya Breakfast is a buffet with cereal, and pastries

Reviews.Title: “Experience!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Expensise. Bad location. The room was dirty and there was only a small window. This window opened into a chimney. Severe lack of natural light. Breakfast service non-existent. Unless you are getting an extremely cheap deal - don't stay here. I have stayed in cleaner Backpackers.

HotelInfo.Name: Travessera Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Travessera de Dalt 121-123, 08024 Barcelona, Spain
